div.p: What advice would you give to help improve the environment?

everybody is responsible to respect the environment and to protect it. to help improve the environment, everyone can act in his daily life by reducing his own impact - you can do some easy things like walking instead of using his car, like reducing the temperature in his sleeping room, ... small acts can reduce the overall impact of the human beings on the earth ! to protect the environment is vital for the future generations : in de latest decenias we considerably increase our impact on the earth and we cannot continue this way of life. we have to consider that new growing countries will have a huge impact on the environment if they adopt our kinds of live. could you imagine that everybody on the earth would have a car ...
